Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Southbound Reroute near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne
ShortDescription: SB 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses temp. rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Commercial/87th
ShortDescription: SB 71 71st/South Shore, 26 South Shore Exp. buses temp. rerouted: South Shore, 83rd, Burley, 87th, and Commercial due to street blockage near Commercial/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore, #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 83rd, Burley, 87th, and Commercial due to street blockage near Commercial/87th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays at Ashland/63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays at Ashland/63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
